data.lyric:
[ti:The Ringer (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Ringer (Explicit) - Eminem (埃米纳姆)
[00:03.87]Producer：illadaproducer/Ronny  J/Eminem
[00:07.74]I'm just gonna write down
[00:10.29]My first thoughts see where this takes me
[00:14.64]Cause I feel like I wanna punch the world in the f**kin' face right now
[00:20.77]Let me explain just how to make greatness
[00:22.45]Straight out the gate I'm 'bout to break it down
[00:24.43]Ain't no mistakes allowed but make no mistake I'm 'bout
[00:26.72]To R**e the alphabet I may raise some brows
[00:28.93]If I press the issue just to get the anger out
[00:31.20]Full magazine could take Staples out
[00:33.05]Savage but ain't thinking 'bout no bank account
[00:35.06]But b**ch I'm off the chain like Kala Brown
[00:37.32]Motherf**ker shut the f**k up when I'm talkin' lil' b**ch
[00:40.12]I'm sorry wait what's your talent
[00:41.96]Oh critiquin'
[00:43.10]My talent
[00:43.61]Oh b**ch I don't know who the f**k y'all are
[00:46.01]To give a sub-par bar
[00:47.19]Even have an opinion if you you mention me
[00:49.67]Millions of views attention in news
[00:51.83]I mention you lose lose for me win win for you
[00:54.92]Billions of views your ten cents are two
[00:56.96]Skim through the music to give a sh*t reviews
[00:58.75]To get clicks but b**ch you just lit the fuse
[01:00.93]Don't get misconstrued business as us
[01:02.92]Sh*t-list renewed so get sh*t to do
[01:04.98]Or get dissed
[01:05.48]'Cause I don't get what the f**k half the sh*t
[01:07.60]Is that you're listening to
[01:08.64]Do you have any idea how much I hate this choppy flow
[01:11.17]Everyone copies though probably no
[01:12.70]Get this f**kin' audio out my Audi yo adiós
[01:15.20]I can see why people like Lil Yachty but not me though
[01:17.84]Not even dissin' it just ain't for me
[01:19.72]All I am simply is just an MC
[01:21.80]Maybe "Stan" just isn't your cup of tea
[01:23.79]Maybe your cup's full of syrup and lean
[01:25.74]Maybe I need to stir up sh*t preferably shake the world up
[01:28.52]If it were up to me
[01:29.91]Paul wants me to chill y'all want me to ill
[01:31.93]I should eat a pill probably I will
[01:33.95]Old me k**l the new me watch him bleed to death
[01:36.13]I breathe on the mirror I don't see my breath
[01:37.94]Possibly I'm dead I must be possessed
[01:40.03]Like an evil spell I'm E-V-I-L evil spelled
[01:43.40]Jam a Crest whitestrip in the tip of my d**k with an ice pick
[01:46.07]Stick it in a vice grip hang it on a spike fence
[01:48.13]Bang it like a pipe bench
[01:49.31]While I take my ballsack and flick it like a light switch
[01:51.16]Like vice-president Mike Pence
[01:52.65]Back up on my sh*t in a sidekick
[01:54.27]As I lay it on a spike strip
[01:56.04]This are things that I'd rather do than hear you on a mic
[01:57.92]Since nine tenths of your rhyme is about ice and
[02:00.26]Jesus Christ man how many times is
[02:01.77]Someone gonna f**k on my b**ch
[02:03.26]F**k my side c**ck
[02:04.72]You won't never see Em icy but as cold as I get on the MIC
[02:08.07]I polarize sh*t so the Thames might freeze
[02:10.26]And your skull might split like I passed you upside it
[02:12.42]B**ch I got the club on smash like a nightstick yeah
[02:15.15]Turn down for what I ain't loud enough
[02:16.99]Nah turn the Valium up
[02:18.21]'Cause I don't know how I'm gonna get your mouths to shut now
[02:20.48]When it doesn't matter what caliber I spit at
[02:22.61]I'll bet a hundred thousand bucks
[02:24.06]You'll turn around and just be like
[02:25.34]Man how the f**k sourpuss gonna get mad just
[02:27.87]'Cause his album sucks
[02:28.81]And now he wants to take it out on us
[02:32.62]But last week an ex-fan mailed me a copy of the Mathers LP to tell me to study
[02:36.55]It'll help me get back to myself and she'll love me
[02:40.90]I mailed the b**ch back and said if I did that
[02:42.68]I'd just be like everyone else in the f**king industry
[02:45.17]Especially an effing Recovery clone of me
[02:47.36]Didn't I think
[02:48.40]So finger-bang chicken wang MGK Iggy 'zae
[02:50.93]L*l P**p Lil Xan imitate Lil Wayne
[02:52.92]I should aim at everybody in the game pick a name
[02:55.25]I'm fed up with being humble
[02:56.39]And rumor is I'm hungry
[02:57.39]I'm sure you heard bumblings
[02:58.32]I heard you wanna rumble like an empty stomach
[03:00.44]I heard your mumbling but it's jumbled in mumbo-jumbo
[03:02.57]The era that I'm from will pummel you
[03:03.75]That's what it's comin' to
[03:04.45]What the f**k you're gonna do when you run into it
[03:06.05]I'm gonna crumble you and I'll take a number two
[03:07.47]And dump on you if you ain't Joyner
[03:08.57]If you ain't Kendrick or Cole
[03:09.58]Or Sean then you're a goner
[03:10.48]I'm 'bout to bring it to anyone in this b**ch who want it
[03:12.65]I guess when you walk into BK you expect a whopper
[03:14.70]You can order a Quarter Pounder when you go to McDonald's
[03:16.39]But if you're lookin' to get a porterhouse you better go get Revival
[03:18.70]But y'all are acting like I tried to serve you up a slider
[03:20.73]Maybe the vocals shouldA been auto-tuned and you would have bought it
[03:22.79]But sayin' I no longer got it
[03:23.84]'Cause you missed the line and never caught it
[03:25.21]'Cause it went over your head because you're too stupid to get it
[03:27.31]'Cause you're mentally retarded but pretend to be the smartest
[03:29.28]With your expertise and knowledge but you'll never be an artist
[03:31.24]And I'm harder on myself than you could ever be regardless
[03:33.17]What I'll never be is flawless all I'll ever be is honest
[03:35.26]Even when I'm gone they're gonna say I brought it
[03:36.87]Even when I hit my forties like a f**kin' alcoholic
[03:38.56]With a bottle full of malt liquor
[03:39.80]But I couldn't bottle this sh*t any longer
[03:41.28]The fact that I know that I'ma hit my bottom if I don't
[03:43.30]Pull myself from the jaws of defeat
[03:44.34]And rise to my feet
[03:45.55]I don't see why y'all even started with me
[03:47.47]I get impeached
[03:48.09]My enemies die
[03:49.18]I don't cease fire 'til at least all are deceased
[03:51.20]I'm eastside never be caught slippin'
[03:52.86]Now you see why I don't sleep
[03:54.16]Not even a wink I don't blink
[03:55.45]I don't doze off I don't even nod to the beats
[03:57.59]I don't even close my f**kin' eyes when I sneeze
[04:00.55]Aw man
[04:01.19]That BET cypher was weak it was garbage the thing ain't even orange
[04:04.33]Oh my God that's a reach
[04:06.12]Shout to all my colorblind people
[04:07.22]Each and every one of y'all
[04:08.38]If you call a fire engine green aquamarine
[04:10.43]Or you think water is pink
[04:11.62]Dawg that's a date
[04:12.45]Looks like an olive to me
[04:13.71]Look there's an apple
[04:14.77]No it's not it's a peach
[04:16.81]So finger-bang Pootie Tang Burger King Gucci Gang dookie dang
[04:19.58]Charlamagne gonna hate anyway
[04:20.98]Doesn't matter what I say
[04:22.11]Give me Donkey of the Day
[04:23.00]What a way for 2018 to get underway
[04:25.01]But I'm gonna say everything that I wanna say
[04:27.68]Welcome to the slaughterhouse b**ch yeah
[04:29.88]Invite them in like a one a day
[04:31.21]I'm not done
[04:32.75]'Cause I feel like the beast of burden
[04:34.09]That line in the sand was it even worth it
[04:35.93]'Cause the way I see people turnin'
[04:37.45]Is makin' it seem worthless
[04:38.73]It's startin' to defeat the purpose
[04:40.22]I'm watchin' my fan base shrink to thirds
[04:42.01]And I was just trying to do the right thing but word
[04:44.09]Has the court of public opinion reached a verdict
[04:46.25]Or still yet to be determined
[04:47.74]'Cause I'm determined to be me critique the w*****p
[04:50.24]But if I could go back I'd at least reword it
[04:52.26]And say I empathize with the people
[04:53.82]This evil serpent sold the dream to that he's deserted
[04:57.32]But I think it's workin'
[04:58.22]These verses are makin' him a wee bit nervous
[05:00.20]And he's too scurred to answer me with words
[05:02.15]'Cause he knows that he will lyrically get murdered
[05:05.12]But I know at least he's heard it
[05:06.55]'Cause Agent Orange just sent the Secret Service
[05:08.41]To meet in person
[05:09.25]To see if I really think of hurtin' him
[05:11.00]Or ask if I'm linked to terrorists
[05:12.66]I said only when it comes to ink and lyricists
[05:15.26]But my beef is more media journalists
[05:17.81]Hold up hold up hold up
[05:19.24]I said my beef is more meaty a journalist
[05:21.58]They can get a mouthful of flesh
[05:23.32]And yes I mean eating a penis
[05:25.17]'Cause they been panning my album to death
[05:27.19]So I been giving the media fingers
[05:29.05]Don't wanna turn this to a counselling sesh
[05:31.37]But they been puttin' me through the wringer
[05:33.01]So I ain't ironin' sh*t out with the press
[05:35.45]But I just took this beat to the cleaners
data.trans:
[ti:The Ringer (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.87]//
[00:07.74]这首歌我只遵循我的第一感观 
[00:10.29]看看我能写成什么样
[00:14.64]因为我现在只想往这个世界丑陋的脸上狠狠来上一拳
[00:20.77]就由我来讲一讲怎样才能造就伟大
[00:22.45]开门见山 我直接出招将你们瓦解
[00:24.43]失误是不被允许的 但我是零失误选手
[00:26.72]我挑个眉就把字母表玩到爆
[00:28.93]我只是泄泄火就被请上了头条
[00:31.20]所有杂志就会铺天盖地地报道
[00:33.05]21 Savage他只惦记着自己的存折
[00:35.06]但我就像Kala Brown那样已经挣脱了拴在脖子上的铁链 
[00:37.32]当我发话的时候 那些小字辈们都给我噤声
[00:40.12]抱歉 等等 你们的天赋是啥
[00:41.96]大评论家
[00:43.10]我的天赋
[00:43.61]伙计 你们算哪根葱
[00:46.01]你拉低业界平均水平
[00:47.19]但是心思却活络
[00:49.67]你提起我以博取百万流量的热搜
[00:51.83]我提起你却是我自降身份，便宜了你
[00:54.92]你就算一文不值也能有数以亿计的曝光度
[00:56.96]草草过一遍我的歌就给出差评
[00:58.75]藉此吸引点击量 但是**你实则点燃了导火索
[01:00.93]别曲解我的意思 我们各有业务
[01:02.92]垃圾榜单更新了 所以你们得制造新垃圾
[01:04.98]而我则被轻视
[01:05.48]就因为我
[01:07.60]对你们在听的这些垃圾音乐完全无感
[01:08.64]你知不知道我对这种洗脑的话风有多厌恶
[01:11.17]所有人都抄来抄去 也许构不成抄袭吧
[01:12.70]让这些稀烂的音频滚出我的奥迪
[01:15.20]我能理解为什么人们宁可喜欢Lil Yachty也不喜欢我
[01:17.84]这都算不上是轻视 只是我不是那派的
[01:19.72]我所想做的只是简简单单当个MC
[01:21.80]也许你只是不好Stan那口
[01:23.79]可能你的杯子里装满了糖浆和紫水
[01:25.74]也许我最好趟一下这摊浑水
[01:28.52]震撼这个世界 因为我就是主宰
[01:29.91]Paul想让我冷静 而你们都希望我发疯
[01:31.93]我该吃药了 也许我会吃
[01:33.95]曾经的我不断**全新的我 看着他流血而亡
[01:36.13]我往镜子上哈气却看不见自己的呼吸
[01:37.94]可能我已经死了 我绝对是着了魔
[01:40.03]就像是恶魔的诅咒 我是邪恶化身 恶魔诅咒了我
[01:43.40]用一把冰镐把佳洁士洁白牙贴镶入我的下体
[01:46.07]再用老虎钳把它牢牢钉入
[01:48.13]再用扳手将它挂在尖头栅栏上
[01:49.31]当我捉起我的下体 然后像照明开关那样轻弹它
[01:51.16]就像Mike Pence当选副总统那样轻而易举
[01:52.65]和我的老班底一起重操旧业 
[01:54.27]就算我选择的路坎坷艰难
[01:56.04]这才是我该做的事而不是听你们唱垃圾歌
[01:57.92]因为你们的歌词九成都是关于冰
[02:00.26]上帝啊 有多少次又有多少人
[02:01.77]想从我的感情生活下手
[02:03.26]你永远不会看到老姆依赖瘾品创作
[02:04.72]但我拿起麦克风的威力却一样凶悍
[02:08.07]我的作品和你们的是云泥之别 泰晤士河都会为之结冰
[02:10.26]你的头盖骨被我碾碎 就像我从你头上从天而降
[02:12.42]我就像夜勤警棍那样直接砸门闯入夜店
[02:15.15]为啥要小声 
[02:16.99]我的音量还不够大呢 来 继续加大音量
[02:18.21]因为除此之外我不知道要怎样才能让你闭上聒噪的嘴
[02:20.48]当我说唱的才干都显得不再重要
[02:22.61]我敢赌上十万美金
[02:24.06]你一定会转头 就像这样对人说
[02:25.34]那个牢骚鬼咋就就发疯了呢
[02:27.87]因为他的新专太烂
[02:28.81]现在他还想把惨淡的销量怪在我们头上
[02:32.62]但是上周 一个以前的粉丝寄给我一份Mathers LP的复件 让我好好学着点
[02:36.55]她说那会让我找回我自己 然后她会继续爱我 
[02:40.90]我给那个女人回了邮件 说若我那么做了
[02:42.68]我就和这个行当里的其他人没有区别了
[02:45.17]尤其是那张该死的Recovery居然还抄了我
[02:47.36]我没想到
[02:48.40]所谓的手指帮 鸡肉王 枪爷 一姐 AZ
[02:50.93]李鹏 李先 都是模仿李伟（李尔·韦恩）
[02:52.92]我应该瞄准这个圈子里的每个人 随便挑个名字
[02:55.25]我已经很谦虚了
[02:56.39]但流言却说我胃口很大 
[02:57.39]我确信你们都听说了
[02:58.32]我也听到你们饥肠辘辘想要捞金
[03:00.44]我也听到你们含糊地嘀咕 但却像念咒一样口齿不清
[03:02.57]我所来自的那个时代会让你连遭重创
[03:03.75]这就是你要遭受的
[03:04.45]当你处于这种境地你能怎么办呢
[03:06.05]我会将你瓦解粉碎
[03:07.47]如果你不是Joyner Lucas的话我就要对你挑剔
[03:08.57]如果你不是Kendrick Lamar或者J Cole
[03:09.58]或者Big Sean 那你算是废了
[03:10.48]谁想对号入座我就是在针对谁
[03:12.65]我猜当你走进汉堡王的时候你会想要个皇堡
[03:14.70]你去麦当劳点个牛肉芝士包不就得了呗
[03:16.39]但你若是想要上等牛排你最好去买我的上张专辑
[03:18.70]但你们装作像是我在企图操控滑杆给你们上菜
[03:20.73]也许声乐作品本来就该自动调音 而你会很乐意买单
[03:22.79]但是却说自己从来不修音
[03:23.84]因为你漏念了一行词并且永远唱不出
[03:25.21]因为这东西超出了你的脑容量 你蠢到根本学不会
[03:27.31]因为你智力迟钝却要装作最为聪明
[03:29.28]守着你那专业技能和知识 但你永远当不成艺术家
[03:31.24]而我对自由永远比你更严格 无论如何
[03:33.17]虽然我永远不可能完美无瑕 但我会永远诚实
[03:35.26]就算我不加理会 他们也说是我先挑衅的
[03:36.87]就算是在我酗酒的那段时期
[03:38.56]瓶中灌满了麦芽酒
[03:39.80]但我无法再忍耐下去了
[03:41.28]事实上我知道我已经跌到人生谷底了
[03:43.30]如果我不振作 不从失败中吸取教训
[03:44.34]并且迈开我的脚步的话
[03:45.55]我甚至不会意识到他们为什么都要从我开刀
[03:47.47]我开始抱怨 
[03:48.09]我的对头都死绝了
[03:49.18]我不会平息怒火 起码要等到他们全都倒下
[03:51.20]我来自东岸 从不会因为小偷小摸被逮捕
[03:52.86]现在你知道我为什么不睡觉了
[03:54.16]我甚至眼都不眨一下
[03:55.45]我不会打盹儿 甚至不会跟着节奏打瞌睡
[03:57.59]我甚至连打喷嚏都不会闭眼
[04:00.55]人啊
[04:01.19]BET颁奖典礼上的那段伴奏太弱了 简直是垃圾 甚至连特朗普都不敢提
[04:04.33]我的老天爷 那可是重点范围
[04:06.12]在这里我得对我的色盲朋友们喊话了
[04:07.22]每一个朋友
[04:08.38]若你们把消防车都看成绿色
[04:10.43]或者认为水是粉色的
[04:11.62]兄弟那是一个枣椰子
[04:12.45]我怎么看着像橄榄
[04:13.71]我怎么看着像橄榄
[04:14.77]不是吧 明明是个桃子
[04:16.81]所以手指帮 大波党 汉堡王 古驰帮 **罢了
[04:19.58]无论我说啥Charlamagne都会恨我 
[04:20.98]别在意我说了什么
[04:22.11]给我颁发最佳蠢货奖吧
[04:23.00]2018年该从哪条路起航
[04:25.01]但我会说出我想说的所有话
[04:27.68]欢迎来到屠宰场 母猪
[04:29.88]一天邀请一个
[04:31.21]我还没完呢
[04:32.75]因为我感觉自己像是一只身负重任的野兽
[04:34.09]说唱的门槛已经低成了这样 难道应该吗
[04:35.93]因为我看着人们转变方向
[04:37.45]让它变得越来越劣质
[04:38.73]已经开始违背本质了
[04:40.22]我眼看着我的忠粉锐减到三分之一
[04:42.01]我只是想要做正确的事情
[04:44.09]但我的言论却被公众舆论所裁决
[04:46.25]或者还在待审中
[04:47.74]因为我已经决心保持本色 我就是要批判那些推崇特朗普的脑残
[04:50.24]但是若我能够回到过去 我起码还能重述一遍
[04:52.26]然后说说我有多同情那些人们
[04:53.82]整天被道德沦丧的奸人兜售那些连他自己都不信的谎言
[04:57.32]但我想那会有用的
[04:58.22]这些歌词会让他有点微微紧张
[05:00.20]他太害怕回应我的歌词
[05:02.15]因为他知道他会被我的嘴炮**
[05:05.12]但我知道他起码听到了我的歌
[05:06.55]因为特朗普政府向我派遣了特工
[05:08.41]私下和我会晤
[05:09.25]想知道我是否真的想攻击他
[05:11.00]或是盘问我是否和恐怖分子有联系
[05:12.66]我说 那只是我想写下的歌词罢了
[05:15.26]但我的矛盾更多的是和媒体人
[05:17.81]等等 你说啥 没听清
[05:19.24]我说我的矛头更多的是对准媒体人
